actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Agency for International Development to issue regulations which, unless disapproved by either House of Congress, will establish a unified personnel system for all employees of that Agency.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Agency for International Development to submit to Congress regulations establishing a unified personnel system for employees of such Agency.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Agency for International Development to issue regulations which, unless disapproved by either House of Congress, will establish a unified personnel system for all employees of that Agency.
